name: node-disco
description: An silent disco back-end written in NodeJS

scripts.create-client: lessc client/style.less > public/style.css && cp client/index.html public && cp client/main.js public
scripts.release: npm run release:prepare && npm run release:exec && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:prepare: git checkout release && git reset --hard master && npm run create-client && npm test
scripts.release:exec: git add public -f && git commit -m "chore(project): add client + release"
scripts.release:publish: git push openshift HEAD:master -f && git checkout master

author: Nico Rehwaldt <git_nikku@nixis.de>
